column2: Muscular dystrophy is a group of diseases that cause progressive weakness and loss of muscle mass.
Diabetes occurs when your blood glucose (also known as blood sugar) is too high.

column1: What are the types of diabetes?
column2: The most common types of diabetes are type 1 type 2 and gestational diabetes.

column1: Does high blood pressure cause kidney disease?
column2: High blood pressure is the second leading cause (after diabetes) and can also be a result of kidney disease.
